"Design a wearable tape measure that can be attached to clothing or accessories for on-the-go measurements."
"Create a smart tape measure that uses sensors and machine learning algorithms to automatically adjust the length of the tape based on the user's body type."
"Develop a portable measuring device that can be used to measure distances in space, such as between planets or stars."
"Create a customizable tape measure that allows users to personalize their measurement tools with their own design or logo."
"Design a tape measure that doubles as a workout tool, allowing users to measure their progress and set fitness goals."
